Eric Schmidt were on the call Thursday with analysts. The search giant's stock was up 1.3 percent in after-hours trading. Google's stock price has climbed by about 6 percent over the past month, and since Google stock is not selling off, it tells you the market is very happy with the report, said Rick Munarriz, a senior analyst at The Motley Fool.
